troubleshooting.title: Fonts Installed in Windows Do Not Appear in Fonts Preferences Page

keywords.indexterm: Installed fonts do not appear in Fonts preferences

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: I installed a font in Windows and it does not appear in the list of available fonts in the Preferences Fonts page (in the Editor section).

steps-informal.p: is a Java application and Java does not detect fonts that are installed at the user level. This most likely occurred because you installed the font via the Install for me option in Windows.
Reinstall the font using the Install for all users option in Windows. You will need Administrator privileges to access this option.
